name: Jet Skinner for BuddyPress
author: Jettochkin

sections.description:
The plugin adds the ability to select the individual schemes of styles for your users buddypress. You can use a widget or menu buddypress Admin Bar

Demo: http://volks-wagen-club.ru

Please Vote ðŸ™‚

Creating Skins

To create a skin for a theme:

  1. Select the theme you would like to skin.
  2. Select ‘Skins’ on the presentation menu.
  3. Click on the ‘Create Skin’ button (down the bottom).
  4. Enter a name for your skin and click on the ‘Create Skin’ button.
  5. Your skin has been created. Click on the edit link.
  6. Edit your skin.
  7. When you are done, go back to the ‘Skins’ page and activate your skin.
  8. If the theme has a skin archive, go to it and let them know that you have created a new skin for the theme.

Release Notes

1.2.5

  • Add BP 1.2.5 compatibility

1.0.3

  • Update Readme

1.0.2

  • Add Lang support
  • Fix any bug

1.0

* Initial release

sections.installation:
1. copy the ‘jet-skinner-for-buddypress’ directory to your wp-contents/plugins directory.
  2. Activate Jet Skinner in your plugins administration page.
  3. You will now see the ‘Skins’ and a ‘Skin Editor’ (if the theme has skins to edit) entrie in the ‘Presentation’ menu.
  4. You will also see a ‘Skin Switcher’ widget in the ‘Widgets’ menu.

short_description: The Skinner plugin adds skin selection and editing to WordPress for Skinner compatible themes.
